languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within range. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text:
Requires Imperialis — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critically hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts burning (10).

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within range. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——信奉者
当装备者或其盟友遭到敌人暴击时，若该敌人在装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}射程{/g}范围内，装备者会立刻使用当前武器对该敌人进行攻击。若此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Range}命中{/g}敌人，额外施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（10）效果。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：帝国主义——信奉者
当装备者或其盟友遭到敌人{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}时，若该敌人在装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}范围内，装备者会立刻使用当前武器对该敌人进行攻击。若此次攻击命中敌人，额外施加燃烧（10）效果。

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — поборник
Когда персонаж или его союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} от противника, персонаж немедленно атакует этого противника используемым оружием, если тот находится в пределах дальности его действия. Если происходит {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, противник получает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (10).
languages.original_text:
Requires Imperialis — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critically hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts burning (10).

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: Империум — поборник.
Когда персонаж или его союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} от противника, персонаж немедленно атакует этого противника используемым оружием, если тот находится в пределах {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальности{/g} его действия. Если происходит попадание, противник получает горение (10).

Требуется: Империум — поборник.
Когда персонаж или его союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} от противника, персонаж немедленно атакует этого противника используемым оружием, если тот находится в пределах {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальности{/g} его действия. Если происходит попадание, противник получает горение (10).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
もし使用者や見方が敵にクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}されたら、使用者は現在の武器を使ってその敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}内にいれば、すぐにアタックする。攻撃が成功したら、この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}（10）与える。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text:
帝国 ― 信奉者が必要
もし使用者や味方が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}され、その敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}内にいれば、使用者は現在の武器を使ってすぐにアタックする。攻撃が成功したら、この攻撃は炎上（10）を与える。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Devoto
Si el portador o un aliado recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico de un enemigo, el portador ataca inmediatamente con su arma actual al enemigo si está a su {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g}. Este ataque inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (10) al impactar.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Imperialis: Devoto
Si el portador o un aliado recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico de un enemigo, el portador ataca inmediatamente con su arma actual al enemigo si está a su {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g}. Este ataque inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (10) al impactar.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Geweihter.
Erleidet der Träger oder sein Verbündeter einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} durch einen Feind, führt der Träger sofort einen Angriff mit seiner aktuellen Waffe gegen diesen Feind aus, sofern sich der Feind in {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} befindet. Bei einem erfolgreichen Treffer verursacht dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (10).
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Imperialis – Geweihter.
Erleidet der Träger oder sein Verbündeter einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffer{/g} durch einen Gegner, führt der Träger sofort einen Angriff mit seiner aktuellen Waffe gegen diesen Gegner aus, sofern sich der Gegner in {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} befindet. Bei einem erfolgreichen Treffer verursacht dieser Angriff Verbrennen (10).

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Disciple.
Si un ennemi inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique à l'utilisateur ou à son allié, l'utilisateur attaque immédiatement cet ennemi à l'aide de l'arme dont il est équipé, à condition que cet ennemi se trouve à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g}. Si un coup est porté à l'ennemi, il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (10).
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Imperialis — Disciple.
Si un ennemi inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g} à l'utilisateur ou à son allié, l'utilisateur attaque immédiatement cet ennemi à l'aide de l'arme dont il est équipé, à condition que cet ennemi se trouve à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g}. Si un coup est porté à l'ennemi, il subit l'effet Combustion (10).
